subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: C. C. Sabathia retired the first 14 hitters he faced, then had a 1-2-3 ninth inning, as the Yankees completed a three-game sweep of the Indians at Yankee Stadium.
snippet: C. C. Sabathia retired the first 14 hitters he faced, then had a 1-2-3 ninth inning, as the Yankees completed a three-game sweep of the Indians at Yankee Stadium.
